sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CatalogTransactionRestartGuide</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Invoked when you restart an order guide</description>
        <name>CatalogTransactionRestartGuide</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include('PrototypeServer');
gs.include('AbstractTransaction');

var CatalogTransactionRestartGuide = Class.create();

CatalogTransactionRestartGuide.prototype =  Object.extendsObject(AbstractTransaction, {
	
	execute : function() {
		var cart;
		var cartName = this.request.getParameter("sysparm_cart_name");
		if (!JSUtil.nil(cartName))
			cart = GlideappCart.get(cartName);
		else
			cart = GlideappCart.get();
		var og = new GlideappOrderGuide(cart.getGuide());
		og.restart(this.request, this.response, cart);
	}
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-09-24 10:22:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>93e14137c0a80027001ea8a70966ebc2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CatalogTransactionRestartGuide</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_93e14137c0a80027001ea8a70966ebc2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-12-26 17:38:50</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>523</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
